name: SnowReportforLoonMountain
0:
”Alexa, open Loon Mountain”
”Alexa, ask Loon Mountain for the snow report”
”Alexa, ask Loon Mountain for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: loon mountain
des: The Loon Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
